channel.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
channel.description:
# Welcome to the Rise of the Unseen, SFoL12 [details="Lore"] 3 years after their victory against the unseen. The Blue Dragon slept peacefully in their castle, not worrying of what is to come next. But this night is what they will regret. You see the unseen have spread their influence far across the realm. There are many Masterminds and Assassins doing many different things. The day before now a message was sent to one of these unseenists. It was a aristocrat with a letter. He was holding the letter in one hand, slowly approaching the mastermind of the unseen and showed him the letter. What it stated was that their stealth invasion of the castle of Adiart had failed. You see Adiart is a important castle within the realm. For it was one of the major empires that was still standing. The Mastermind looked at the note, he was angered. The fact that their operation failed was not something to let loose to the fellow unseen. The Mastermind began to study all of the people that lived in the castle of Adiart and how to manipulate them into helping the unseen. He first looked at the prince, a powerful figure. He figured that if he was to threaten the prince with revealing that 5 years ago he executed a Blue Dragon member then he would join. He saw the alchemist, he could easily destroy his reputation by revealing that he killed our beloved observer that she thought was a mastermind. The scorned, oh how easy he could get him to side with the unseen. For the scorned already had a hatred, and the unseen would help to kill those who she hated. Now we jump back to the present, 2 figures were at the gate of Adiart. The Mastermind and The Assassin, although these were not the old ones. These were more experienced ready to take Adiart. But with this time the sheriff learned how he could find the unseen better. The unseen were let into the castle none to suspect them. [/details] ## Hosted by Braixen/Bakura. -----
## Rules https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
## Gameplay • Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 48 hours. • All actions must be sent to the mod. • Unseen will talk via special Discord server. • All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions • To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” • Votes saying Guilty or Not Guilty before the target is on the stand will not be counted. • Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can say a defense, and the rest of the players must vote Guilty or Not Guilty on the thread. • Players can discuss while the target is on trial. • No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The Only exception is the king’s Decide Fate. • After the voting, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote. Should the king not respond, the majority vote will be accepted. • The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. • If the day timer runs out before a total majority is hit, the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
## Picking a New King • If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. • After a king’s execution the day does not end, an election shall be held right after. • When the king dies 24 hours is given for any player with royal blood to step up and take the throne. • After that 24 hours anyone is free to step up. • If only 1 person steps up when the day ends that person becomes the king • If 2 people step forward everyone votes on who should be the next king. Whoever has the most votes at the end of the day becomes the king. If the votes are tied whoever stepped up 1st becomes the king ## Action Results
[details="Night"]
You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed [/details]
[details="Day"] You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You’ve been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You’ve been slapped and cannot vote You’ve been threatened [/details]
## Journals • PM the host what you want on your journal. • When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Death Notes • Need to be drawn • Submitted with the kills
## Special Features • This game will only feature unseen as the main scum faction. • Unseen can now convert classes that were normally unconvertable • Buffs to Sheriff and Mastermind.
[details="Sheriff Buffo"] -Day ability: Debuty, Check a Person at night. 1 person, if you die that night they will become a sheriff, unless they are unconvertable - Investigate: Check 2 people to see if they are a member of the unseen. [/details]
• King can be converted ## Class List of Converted Classes
[details="Converted Prince"]
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Executive</FONT>
Unseen Offensive
Abilities
Passive: Royal Blood: [Only usable upon the death of a king] As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King.
Day: Lock up: Lock up a person in a cell for tonight (Looks like prince cell) but you can't see what they say and you can't talk (3 uses) (If fails, it will not take a use)
Day: Search!: Search a Player for their journal allowing you to read it. (2 uses)
Night: Interrogate: Visit the Cell at night and talk to the person in the cell as if you were the prince (You will appears as the prince) (Can't be stopped via Occupy) (2 uses)
Night: Command: Command a Player to visit another player (Counts as occupation, so anyone immune to occupation will be immune to it). They will know if this happens (5 Uses) [/details]
[details="Converted Alchemist"] ## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Plague Doctor</FONT>
Unseen Support
Passive: Safety of the Mask: With your mask you are immune to poison and bleeding . You are also immune to your first attack.
Day: Fake Nightshade: Make a player think that they have been poisoned (2 uses)
Night: Sleeping Gas: Fill a player's room with sleeping gas making them be occupied as well as any other visitors. (3 uses)
Night: Potion of Strength: Give your assassin a potion of strength allowing him to bypass night immunity (2 uses) [/details]
[details="Converted Reaper"]
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">The Haunt </FONT>
Unseen Offensive
Day: Stalk: Stalk a player for the day seeing who they use their abilities on (3 uses)
Day: Consume Soul: Consume a Soul to come back alive for a day negating all of your passives (Special)
Night: Cloak of Darkness: Cloak a player in darkness making them appears suspicious to investigators, OR cloak a unseen member in darkness to make them appear good to investigators. (3 uses)
Night: Dream Haunt: Haunt a player's dream as another player, making them unable to visit the person who appeared in their dream until you use this ability on another player. (3 uses) [/details]
[details="Converted Possessor"]
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Body Snatcher</FONT>
Unseen Special
Passive: Blackened Shield: Immune to Death at Night
Night: Body Theft: Steal a Person's body, killing them then placing you into their body with their unseen counterpart. [/details]
[details="Converted Fool"]
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Lunatic</FONT>
Unseen Wildcard
Passive: Curse of Insanity: One person who votes guilty when you are being executed (random) will be instantly converted.
Day: Surprise!: If a player uses a day ability they will instead use it on you. {Doesn't Signal them, also doesn't work on nightshade.}(3 Uses)
Night: Dirty Work: Forage for the Assassin (3 uses) [/details]
[details="Converted Scorned"]
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Forsaken</FONT>
Unseen Social
Passive: Alone: Due to you being alone you lock your door at night (Immune to Visitors)
Day: Forged Vote: Make a player vote for another player, they are unable to revert this (3 uses)
Night: Blind Eyes: Make a player receive their information late from the night (Infinite Uses) [/details]
## Players 1. Inpanity 2. [s]Nuclear Pan[/s] 3. [s]Pokeman Pan Ryan[/s] 4. [s]PolikPanbliss[/s] 5. Pangle **KING** 6. FrostPan 7. [s]Wolfy with a PAn[/s] 8. HippoPan 9. Simpan 10. NozPanz 11. Exce with a Vanilla Pan 12. Marluxipan 13. Damapan 14. [s]kyopan[/s] 15. 3DT_CheesyPANS 16. AgentPan
## Time Stamps [Confirmation Stage](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-all-pans-thrown-confirmation-stage/25190/76) [Hail to the King](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-all-pans-thrown-confirmation-stage/25190/177) [Night One](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-all-pans-thrown-confirmation-stage/25190/248) [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pight-1/25190/255) [Kyo's Trial](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pay-2-get-1-free/25190/1197) [Polik's Trial](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pay-2-get-1-free/25190/1600) [Night 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pay-3-dollars-for-entry/25190/1763) [Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pight-2/25190/1770) [Night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pight-3/25190/2354) [Day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pight-3/25190/2357) [Frost's Trial](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-12-the-return-of-the-unseen-pight-3/25190/2508) ## Graveyard 0 - my sanity 1 - PolikPanbliss - Possessor 2 - Nuclear - Maid 3 - PKR - Asasssin 4 - Kyo - Knight 5 - Wolfy - Drunk

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
He thought it was susp that he was blocked and only 1 attack.

Personally I didn’t actually notice that at all but the second he said he got some actions in a seperate pm I was immediately suspicious of him. When you corroborated his claim I thought he was inno untill he defended him Simon so obviously.

Read full topic

item.description:
So basically, I was the one that says Nuclear have to die N2.

That slowed down for sure otherwise PKR would be caught much earlier when Nuclear find out he’s not from royal blood with his princess claim.

Why PKR decide that I healed him, I never know.

Read full topic

item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
BD just made a lot of sensible plays, some unintentional.

Dama blocking PKR N1 undoubtedly won us the game this early so he is somehow the mvp. Kyo made a good call steeling Simon, as did eevee for calling him out first (although technically he wasn’t BD he basically was). Insanity remembering Maid was also good but kind of obvious I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Simon would have been more active and not do something gamethrowing by claiming Scorned with starter assassin as one of two targets, he would have gone for the merc.

Turns out we got no observer either so that was for nothing either.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I am also actually wrong about the night results between “You have been attacked but you survived” and “You have been attacked but you got healed” sort of thing, turns out it has to be the one and same “but you survived” part.

I got the 50/50 odds who I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Simon is fortunate enough I have changed my mind of using Will-O-Wisp to Flirting the prince.

Even thought about giving my wisp result to Marl first night, my intuition didn’t fail to amuse me.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
I was in 10. The very unfortunate one where it turns out that every single message was asked for clarification so I got caught out that way. Still slightly mad about that game as every single message was revealed when I was the last member of the Unseen, so that screwed me over big time with my fake Physician claims

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103

You saw FoL10 right?

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Ahhhh

So he blocked me from debauching you.

Also Frost, I have to admit, you have been working on your playstyle better and better.

You had me convinced that you were the physician at first and the fact that you didn’t show your scummy side. However, you can improve it slightly more. When you’re caught, don’t fall into further panic and the start flip flopping with claims, as you got caught out that way. As well as that, don’t try and follow the BD too much, as that’s when I started getting a bit suspicious of you

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.description:
One thing is for sure: My weakness are Court Wizards.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}

item.title: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I was going to plan to kill you and frame someone else for murder (Whoever got debauched that night) and I panicked while I haven’t checked the result clearly, shows I wasn’t debauched but just successfully attacked you, turns out Hippolytus uses his ability on me to prevent visits and he thought he blocked me.

Tsk tsk, his and his big mouth.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL 12 The Return of The Unseen! {BD, Merc, Alch win}
